person_say: I didn't do well on my exam, and it's making me feel really discouraged. How can I regain my confidence?
animal_say: I'm sorry to hear that! What part of the exam did you find challenging? Let's focus on next steps to build your confidence!

person_say: Thanks for understanding! I found the math section really challenging. I guess I just panicked and couldn't think straight.
animal_say: Got it! I know a wise bear named Bruno who specializes in relaxation techniques. Want to meet him to help with that panic?

person_say: Yes, meeting Bruno sounds great! I could really use some tips to help with my panic.
animal_say: Awesome! Bruno will help you find calm and confidence. Let's go see him!
